sentences.en: All this questioning is so analytical and clinical — it kills romance.
sentences.cn: 整个询问分析性和逻辑性太强，浪漫的气息荡然无存。

sentences.en: Analytical quality control is essential in geochemistry.
sentences.cn: 在地球化学中,分析质量的控制至关重要.

sentences.en: Analytical solutions for three dimensional elasticity problems are quite difficult to obtain.
sentences.cn: 三维弹性问题的解析解是很难得到的.

sentences.en: As a result, analytical data obtained by analysts were often in disagreement.
sentences.cn: 结果各个分析家所得的分析数据常常不一致.

sentences.en: Concurrent with the evolution of environmental engineering practice, analytical methods have been developed.
sentences.cn: 与环境工程进展相一致, 已发展了某些分析方法.

sentences.en: For most analytical applications, 100 to 200 mesh beads are sufficient.
sentences.cn: 对于大多数分析工作来说, 100目至200目的颗粒已经足够.

sentences.en: He lacked profundity and analytical precision.
sentences.cn: 他缺乏深度和分析的精确性。

sentences.en: Hobbes is a precursor of modern positivism and analytical jurisprudence.
sentences.cn: 霍布斯是现代实证主义法学和分析法学的先驱.

sentences.en: I have an analytical approach to every survey.
sentences.cn: 对每项调查我都采用分析方法。

sentences.en: In a series of analytical papers, scientists noted other curiosities.
sentences.cn: 在一系列的分析论文中, 科学家发现另外一些奇异现象.

sentences.en: She has a clear analytical mind.
Socrates was the greatest practitioner of this analytical search for fundamental assumptions.
sentences.cn: 苏格拉底是这种以理性分析法探求基本假设的最伟大的实践者.

sentences.en: The procedure described above for obtaining the gain defies simple analytical approaches.
sentences.cn: 上述求得增益的步骤通过简单的解析方式是难以达到的.

sentences.en: These are men of great sensibility as well as analytical ability.
sentences.cn: 这些人的感性极高,分析能力也强.

sentences.en: Whether analytical or romantic, it is committed to existence, not to essence.
sentences.cn: 它不论是持分析态度或持浪漫主义态度, 只是涉及存在而不涉及本质.

words.tran_cn: 分析的；解析的；善于分析的
分析者；精神分析医师；分解者
[计] 分析器；分析者；检偏镜

phrases.tran_cn: （灵敏度为0.1到0.01毫克的）分析天平
分析哲学；语言分析学派
分析技术，分析技术方法

trans.tran_en: thinking about things in a detailed and intelligent way, so that you can examine and understand things
